groups.description:
Groups of buttons. you can activate each group by `way-edges [group_name]`.
Default empty array

name.description:
Name of the group, can be empty if exist only one group.
Default empty string

widgets.description:
Button items: available params:
edge | position | layer | width | height | margin | monitor_id | monitor_name | widget

name.description: Name of the widget, can be empty

edge.description:
edge of the screen: top/bottom/left/right.
Default `left`

position.description:
position of the edge: top/bottom; left/right; or leave empty string for center.
Default `center`

layer.description:
layer of the screen: background/bottom/top/overlay.
Default `top`

margins.description:
margins of the widget, relative to the `position`.
Default all 0.

top.description:
top margin of the button
Default 0

bottom.description:
bottom margin of the button
Default 0

left.description:
left margin of the button
Default 0

right.description:
right margin of the button
Default 0

monitor.description:
To be shown on which monitor, index or name.
Default 0
